languages.text: "Ирлиэт, ты останешься с нами? Я вскоре покину этот мир и отправлюсь к звездам — быть может, ты желаешь того же?"

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт, ты останешься с нами? Я вскоре покину этот мир и отправлюсь к звездам — быть может, ты желаешь того же?"

languages.text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, ты останешься с нами? Я вскоре покину этот мир и отправлюсь к звездам — быть может, ты желаешь того же?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"
"Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"
"Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"
"Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，你要和我们一起来吗？我很快就会离开这个世界，前往群星之中，或许你也想去那里？”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，你要和我们一起来吗？我很快就会离开这个世界，前往群星之中，或许你也想去那里？”

languages.text: 「ユリエット、一緒に来ないか？{mf|俺|私}たちは間もなくこの星を出発して星の海へと向かう。お前も同行したいのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、一緒に来ないか？{mf|俺|私}たちは間もなくこの星を出発して星の海へと向かう。お前も同行したいのではないか？」

languages.text: "Yrliet, bleibt Ihr bei uns? Ich werde diese Welt bald verlassen und zu den Sternen aufbrechen – vielleicht wollt Ihr das ja auch?"
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, bleibt Ihr bei uns? Ich werde diese Welt bald verlassen und zu den Sternen aufbrechen – vielleicht wollt Ihr das ja auch?"

languages.text: « Yrliet, comptez-vous rester avec nous ? Je vais bientôt quitter ce monde pour rejoindre les étoiles, vous aimeriez peut-être en faire autant ? »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, comptez-vous rester avec nous ? Je vais bientôt quitter ce monde pour rejoindre les étoiles, vous aimeriez peut-être en faire autant ? »

languages.text: «Yrliet, ¿te quedarás con nosotros? No tardaré mucho en abandonar este mundo y dirigirme a las estrellas. ¿Te gustaría acompañarnos?».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, ¿te quedarás con nosotros? No tardaré mucho en abandonar este mundo y dirigirme a las estrellas. ¿Te gustaría acompañarnos?».

languages.text: "Yrliet, bizimle gelecek misin? Yakında bu dünyadan ayrılıp yıldızlara döneceğim... Sen de bana katılmak ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, are you staying with us? I'll be departing this world soon and heading for the stars — perhaps you want to do that too?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, bizimle gelecek misin? Yakında bu dünyadan ayrılıp yıldızlara döneceğim... Sen de bana katılmak ister misin?"
